issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
After some time ..ActiveMQ is not dequeueing...We are adding 13K message every 10 minute..It's working for some time after that Dequeuing count stays the same ..while enqueueing count keeps increasing.



We are using ActiveMQ 5.1
Spring 2.5
Tomcat 6
JDK 1.6
fields.summary: dequeue is stalled compared to enqueue pace
